sentence: As early primary voting began in the Midwestern battleground state of Ohio on Tuesday, social media users questioned the authenticity of a photo used in a campaign ad by U.S. Senate candidate Josh Mandel.
author: SOPHIA TULP - Associated Press
title: FACT FOCUS: Josh Mandel Senate campaign ad scrutinized
